title: Ambohidranandriana
text:
Ambohidranandriana is a town and commune in <a href="Madagascar">Madagascar</a>. It belongs to the <a href="Districts%20of%20Madagascar">district</a> of <a href="Antsirabe%20II%20District">Antsirabe II</a>, which is a part of <a href="Vakinankaratra%20Region">Vakinankaratra Region</a>. The population of the commune was estimated to be approximately 11,000 in 2001 commune <a href="census">census</a>.
Primary and junior level secondary education are available in town. The majority 90% of the population of the commune are farmers, while an additional 10% receives their livelihood from raising livestock. The most important crops are <a href="rice">rice</a> and <a href="Soybean">soya</a>, while other important agricultural products are <a href="maize">maize</a> and <a href="potato">potato</a>es.
